charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Haku (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Haku (S) is not sure why he is among the living again but his dream of protecting Zabuza pushes him to go all out.

abilities.name: Crystal Ice Mirror
abilities.description: Using Crystal Ice Mirror Edo Tensei Haku (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy.  Edo Tensei Haku (S) gains 10 destructible defense for 1 turn when this skill is used.

abilities.name: Sacrificial Detainment
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Haku (S) uses Sacrificial Detainment. The following turn Edo Tensei Haku (S) gains 50% unpierceable damage reduction and the first enemy that uses a skill on him will have their physical and ranged skills stunned for 2 turns. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Silent Acupuncture
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Haku (S) uses Silent Acupuncture on one enemy dealing 30 damage. This skill ignores invulnerability.

abilities.name: Ice Style Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Haku (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
